Life is precious, and every day counts. Life in Days is a simple yet powerful Chrome widget that helps you make the most of your time by visualizing your life as a countdown. Track the days you've lived and the days you have left based on your chosen life expectancy.

Features:
- Set your target age to visualize your life journey the way you want.
- See how many days you've already lived and how many remain based on your chosen life expectancy.
- A clear, visual breakdown that lets you track your progress in life, reminding you to make each day count.

Life in Days helps you stay focused on what truly matters. By providing a clear view of time, it encourages you to prioritize effectively and make better decisions. The visualization serves as a daily source of inspiration, reminding you to live each day with intention and purpose. Setting it up is effortless—just add it to Chrome, and you can begin tracking your life journey in seconds. Whether you're seeking motivation, a daily reminder of time’s passage, or simply a way to reflect, Life in Days offers a unique perspective on the value of each day.
